Title: Trapeze
Writer: Max Catto (novel), Liam O'Brien (adaptation), James R. Webb (screenplay)
Actors: Burt Lancaster, Tony Curtis, Gina Lollobrigida, Katy Jurado
Plot: Mike Ribble was once a great trapeze artist - and the only the sixth to have completed a triple somersault - before his accident. Tino joins the circus, and manages to convince Mike to teach him the 'triple'. Meanwhile Lola, a tumbler, wants to get in on the act.
